
Changelog
=========


0.3 (2012-11-07)
-------------------

- added title and description (option) [espenmn]

0.2 (2012-09-13)
-------------------

- added arrows (buttons) with 'steps', this means it is now possible to scroll by more than one. [espenmn]
- added rewind button. [espenmn] 


0.1 (2012-09-05)
-------------------

- Initial release
